title: Ship schema
description: A schema for ships used in STFC.

blueprints.title: The blueprints schema
blueprints.description: Information about the blueprints for the ship.

cost.title: The cost schema
cost.description: Cost of a single blueprint for the ship.

quantity.title: The quantity schema
quantity.description: Number of blueprints needed to build the ship.

faction.title: The faction schema
faction.description: The faction where the ship belongs to.

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: The grade of the ship with stars

img_url.title: The img_url schema
img_url.description: The URL of the ships image

requirements.title: The requirements schema
requirements.description: List of all requirements needed before the ship can be build.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: The name of the required item.

level.title: The level schema
level.description: The level of the required item needed.

required_scrapyard_level.title: The required_scrapyard_level schema
required_scrapyard_level.description: The scrapyard level needed to scrap the ship.

scrappable.title: The scrappable schema
scrappable.description: Boolean wether the ship can be scrapped or not.

ship_ability.title: The ship_ability schema
ship_ability.description: Instance for the ability of the ship.

buff.title: The buff schema
buff.description: (Optional) buff information regarding the ability of the ship.

percentage.title: The percentage schema
percentage.description: Boolean wether the ability is a percentage or not.

ship_class.title: The ship_class schema
ship_class.description: The class instance of the ship

build_time.title: The build_time schema
build_time.description: The total build time for the current tier (in seconds)

components.title: The components schema
components.description: List of all components of the current tier.

additional_info.title: The additional_info schema
additional_info.description: Instance of component specific info. Given sub schemas are optional, depending on component.

armor_info.title: The armor_info schema
armor_info.description: Holds info about the armor component.

armor.title: The armor schema
armor.description: The total armor when upgrading the component.

hull_health.title: The hull_health schema
hull_health.description: The total hull health when upgrading the component.

cargo_info.title: The cargo_info schema
cargo_info.description: Holds info about the cargo bay component.

increased_cargo.title: The increased_cargo schema
increased_cargo.description: The total increased cargo when upgrading the component.

increased_protected_cargo.title: The increased_protected_cargo schema
increased_protected_cargo.description: The total increased protected cargo when upgrading the component.

ship_increased_cargo.title: The ship_increased_cargo schema
ship_increased_cargo.description: The total increased cargo when upgrading the ship.

ship_increased_protected_cargo.title: The ship_increased_protected_cargo schema
ship_increased_protected_cargo.description: The total increased protected cargo when upgrading the ship.

impulse_info.title: The impulse_info schema
impulse_info.description: Holds info about the impulse engine component.

dodge.title: The dodge schema
dodge.description: The total dodge capability when upgrading the component.

impulse_speed.title: The impulse_speed schema
impulse_speed.description: The total impulse speed when upgrading the component.

mining_laser_info.title: The mining_laser_info schema
mining_laser_info.description: Holds info about the mining laser component.

mining_bonus.title: The mining_bonus schema
mining_bonus.description: The total mining bonus when upgrading the component (in percentage).

shield_info.title: The shield_info schema
shield_info.description: Holds info about the shield component.

shield_deflection.title: The shield_deflection schema
shield_deflection.description: The total shield deflection when upgrading the component.

shield_health.title: The shield_health schema
shield_health.description: The total shield health when upgrading the component.

warp_info.title: The warp_info schema
warp_info.description: Holds info about the warp engines component. Also for spore drive component.

warp_distance.title: The warp_distance schema
warp_distance.description: The total warp distance when upgrading the component.

warp_speed.title: The warp_speed schema
warp_speed.description: The total warp speed when upgrading the component.

weapons_info.title: The weapons_info schema
weapons_info.description: Holds info about a weapon component.

accuracy.title: The accuracy schema
accuracy.description: The total accuracy when upgrading the component.

armor_pierce.title: The armor_pierce schema
armor_pierce.description: The total armor piercing when upgrading the component.

crit_chance.title: The crit_chance schema
crit_chance.description: The total critical chance when upgrading the component (in percentage).

crit_damage.title: The crit_damage schema
crit_damage.description: The total critcal damage when upgrading the component (in percentage).

firing_pattern.title: The firing_pattern schema
firing_pattern.description: The firing pattern of the weapon.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Single round. 0 when loading, otherwise number of shots in this round.

max_damage.title: The max_damage schema
max_damage.description: The weapons maximum amount of damage.

min_damage.title: The min_damage schema
min_damage.description: The weapons minimum amount of damage.

shield_pierce.title: The shield_pierce schema
shield_pierce.description: The total shield piercing when upgrading the component.

build_cost.title: The build_cost schema
build_cost.description: All cost needed to upgrade the component

materials.title: The materials schema
materials.description: All materials needed to upgrade the component.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Single material to upgrade the component.

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: The grade in stars of the material.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The value needed of the material.

others.title: The others schema
others.description: All other costs required to upgrade the component.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount required of this cost.

resources.title: The resources schema
resources.description: All resources needed to upgrade the component.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Single resource to upgrade the component.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount needed of the current resource.

img_url.title: The img_url schema
img_url.description: An URL of the component image.

repair_cost.title: The repair_cost schema
repair_cost.description: List of all costs involved in repairing the ship.

type.title: The type schema
type.description: Type of resource or other needed to repair the ship.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The value needed of the current resource or other.

initial_build_cost.title: The initial_build_cost schema
initial_build_cost.description: All cost needed to build the ship to tier 1. Field only used for tier 1.

materials.title: The materials schema
materials.description: All materials needed to build the ship.

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: The grade in stars of the material.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The value needed of the material.

others.title: The others schema
others.description: All other costs required to build the ship.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount required of this cost.

resources.title: The resources schema
resources.description: All resources needed to build the ship.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount needed of the current resource.

levels.title: The levels schema
levels.description: All XP levels of the current tier.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Single level of the current tier.

ability_bonus.title: The ability_bonus schema
ability_bonus.description: Current ability bonus with this level.

additional_officer_slot.title: The additional_officer_slot schema
additional_officer_slot.description: Boolean wether or not the current level opens a new officer slot.

scrap_details.title: The scrap_details schema
scrap_details.description: Scrapping details for when the ship is scrapped at this level.

rewards.title: The rewards schema
rewards.description: List of all rewards gained from scrapping at current level.

type.title: The type schema
type.description: Type of resource, material or other

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: (Optional) Grade in stars of the material.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: Amount given of this resource, material or other after scrapping at this level.

scrap_time.title: The scrap_time schema
scrap_time.description: The total time needed to scrap the ship (in seconds)

ship_xp.title: The ship_xp schema
ship_xp.description: Ship XP needed to upgrade the ship to this level.

repair_time.title: The repair_time schema
repair_time.description: The total repair time for the current tier (in seconds)

tier_locked_by_ops.title: The tier locked by ops schema
tier_locked_by_ops.description: (Optional) Operations level required to upgrade to this tier.
